adventuring_time.actual_requirements: Visit all of these 42 biomes. Other biomes may also be visited, but are ignored for the advancement.

arbalistic.actual_requirements: This is a hidden advancement, meaning that it can be viewed by the player only after completing it.
arbalistic.in_game_description: Kill five unique mobs with one crossbow shot

bullseye.actual_requirements: Shoot the center of a target with a projectile.
bullseye.in_game_description: Hit the bullseye of a Target block with an arrow

hero_of_the_village.in_game_description: Successfully defend a village from a raid

honey_block_slide.actual_requirements: Collide on a horizontal side of a honey block when in air.
honey_block_slide.in_game_description: Jump into a Honey Block to break your fall

kill_a_mob.actual_requirements: Kill one of these 25 mobs. In Java Edition 1.16, elder guardians, ender dragons, endermites, hoglins, piglins, vexes, withers, and zoglins can also be killed for this advancement. Other mobs may be killed, but are ignored for the advancement.

kill_all_mobs.actual_requirements: Kill each of these 25 mobs. In Java Edition 1.16, elder guardians, ender dragons, endermites, hoglins, piglins, vexes, withers and zoglins are also required for the advancement. Other mobs may be killed, but are ignored for the advancement.
kill_all_mobs.in_game_description: Kill one of every hostile monster

root.actual_requirements: Kill any entity, or be killed by any entity.

shoot_arrow.actual_requirements: Using a bow or a crossbow, shoot an entity with an arrow, tipped arrow or spectral arrow.

sniper_duel.actual_requirements: Kill a skeleton with a projectile while being at least 50 blocks away horizontally.
sniper_duel.in_game_description: Kill a Skeleton from at least 50 meters away

summon_iron_golem.in_game_description: Summon an Iron Golem to help defend a village

totem_of_undying.in_game_description: Use a Totem of Undying to cheat death

trade.actual_requirements: Take an item from a villager or wandering trader's trading output slot, and put it in your inventory.

two_birds_one_arrow.in_game_description: Kill two Phantoms with a piercing arrow

very_very_frightening.actual_requirements: Hit a villager with lightning created by a Trident with the Channeling enchantment.

whos_the_pillager_now.actual_requirements: Kill a pillager with a crossbow.
whos_the_pillager_now.in_game_description: Give a Pillager a taste of their own medicine

dragon_breath.actual_requirements: Have a bottle of dragon's breath in your inventory.
dragon_breath.in_game_description: Collect dragon's breath in a glass bottle

dragon_egg.actual_requirements: Have a dragon egg in your inventory.

elytra.actual_requirements: Have a pair of elytra in your inventory.
elytra.parent: The City at the End of the Game

enter_end_gateway.actual_requirements: Throw an ender pearl through or walk into an End gateway.

find_end_city.advancement: The City at the End of the Game
find_end_city.in_game_description: Go on in, what could happen?

levitate.actual_requirements: Move a vertical distance of 50 blocks with the levitation effect applied.
levitate.in_game_description: Levitate up 50 blocks from the attacks of a Shulker
levitate.parent: The City at the End of the Game

respawn_dragon.actual_requirements: Summon an ender dragon using ender crystals.

balanced_diet.actual_requirements: Eat each of these 39 foods. Other foods are ignored for this advancement.
balanced_diet.in_game_description: Eat everything that is edible, even if it's not good for you

break_diamond_hoe.actual_requirements: Exhaust the durability of a diamond hoe, breaking it.
break_diamond_hoe.in_game_description: Completely use up a diamond hoe and then reevaluate your life choices

bred_all_animals.actual_requirements: Breed pairs of each of these 15 mobs. In Java Edition 1.16, hoglins are also required for this advancement. A trader llama does not count as a llama. Other breedable mobs, if any, are ignored for the advancement.

fishy_business.actual_requirements: Use a fishing rod to catch a fish.

plant_seed.actual_requirements: Plant one of these 5 seeds. Crops and plants without seeds are ignored for this advancement.
plant_seed.in_game_description: Plant a seed and watch it grow

root.actual_requirements: Eat anything that can be eaten.
root.in_game_description: The world is full of friends and food

safely_harvest_honey.in_game_description: Use a Campfire to collect Honey from a Beehive using a Bottle without aggravating the bees

silk_touch_nest.in_game_description: Move a Bee Nest, with 3 bees inside, using Silk Touch

tactical_fishing.actual_requirements: Use a water bucket on a fish mob to get a bucket of fish.
tactical_fishing.in_game_description: Catch a fish... without a fishing rod!

all_effects.actual_requirements:
Have all of these 26 effects applied to the player at the same time. This is a hidden advancement, meaning that it can be viewed by the player only after completing it: 

 Absorption, Bad Omen, Blindness, Conduit Power, Dolphin's Grace, Fire Resistance, Glowing, Haste, Hero of the Village, Hunger, Invisibility, Jump Boost, Levitation, Mining Fatigue, Nausea, Night Vision, Poison, Regeneration, Resistance, Slow Falling, Slowness, Speed, Strength, Water Breathing, Weakness, Wither.
all_effects.in_game_description: Have every effect applied at the same time

all_potions.actual_requirements:
Have all of these 13 potion effects applied to the player at the same time. 

 Fire resistance, Invisibility, Jump boost, Night vision, Poison, Regeneration, Resistance, Slow Falling, Slowness, Speed, Strength, Water breathing, Weakness
all_potions.in_game_description: Have every potion effect applied at the same time

brew_potion.actual_requirements: Pick up an item from a brewing stand potion slot. This does not need to be a potion. Water bottles or even empty bottles also trigger this advancement.

create_beacon.actual_requirements: Be within a 20xx20x14 cuboid centered on a beacon block when it realizes it has become powered.

create_full_beacon.actual_requirements: Be within a 20x20x14 cuboid centered on a beacon block when it realizes it is being powered by a size 4 pyramid.
create_full_beacon.in_game_description: Bring a beacon to full power

fast_travel.actual_requirements: Use the Nether to travel between 2 points in the Overworld with a minimum horizontal distance of 7000 blocks between each other, about 875 blocks in the Nether.
fast_travel.in_game_description: Use the Nether to travel 7 km in the Overworld

find_fortress.in_game_description: Break your way into a Nether Fortress

get_wither_skull.actual_requirements: Have a wither skeleton skull in your inventory.

obtain_blaze_rod.actual_requirements: Have a blaze rod in your inventory.
obtain_blaze_rod.in_game_description: Relieve a Blaze of its rod

return_to_sender.actual_requirements: Kill a ghast using a ghast fireball.
return_to_sender.in_game_description: Destroy a Ghast with a fireball

summon_wither.actual_requirements: Be within a 100.9x100.9x103.5 cuboid centered on the Wither when it is spawned.

uneasy_alliance.actual_requirements: Kill a Ghast while you are in the Overworld.
uneasy_alliance.in_game_description: Rescue a Ghast from the Nether, bring it safely home to the Overworld... and then kill it

cure_zombie_villager.actual_requirements: Throw a splash potion of weakness at a zombie villager and give it a golden apple (by facing the zombie and pressing the use key with a golden apple in your hand), then wait for the villager to be cured.
cure_zombie_villager.in_game_description: Weaken and then cure a Zombie Villager

deflect_arrow.actual_requirements: Deflect any projectile with a shield.
deflect_arrow.in_game_description: Deflect an arrow with a shield

enchant_item.in_game_description: Enchant an item at an Enchanting Table

enter_the_nether.in_game_description: Build, light and enter a Nether Portal

form_obsidian.actual_requirements: Have a block of obsidian in your inventory.
form_obsidian.in_game_description: Form and mine a block of Obsidian

iron_tools.actual_requirements: Have an iron pickaxe in your inventory.

lava_bucket.actual_requirements: Have a lava bucket in your inventory.

mine_diamond.actual_requirements: Have a diamond in your inventory.

mine_stone.in_game_description: Mine stone with your new pickaxe

obtain_armor.actual_requirements: Have any type of iron armor in your inventory.
obtain_armor.in_game_description: Protect yourself with a piece of iron armor

root.actual_requirements: Have a crafting table in your inventory.
root.in_game_description: The heart and story of the game

shiny_gear.actual_requirements: Have any type of diamond armor in your inventory.

smelt_iron.actual_requirements: Have an iron ingot in your inventory.

upgrade_tools.actual_requirements: Have a stone pickaxe in your inventory.
